useStatments.statement: First, If You Use Terminal For The First Time, Please Enter Your Name, And Then Click On Open Terminal
Second, You Can Run Commands By Writing In Terminal Area The Next Command, And Then Click On Enter .
For Displaying All Of Commands, Please Write Command:
This Terminal it is not Characters Case Sensitive (example: get is equal GET)
Last, I Wish You A Fantastic Experince With My Terminal .

useStatementsAsTerminalCommandResults.statement: First, If You Use Terminal For The First Time, Please Enter Your Name, And Then Click On Open Terminal
Second, You Can Run Commands By Writing In Terminal Area The Next Command, And Then Click On Enter: emt [commandName] --[parameterName] [value]
For Displaying All Of Commands, Please Write Command: emt get --all-commands
This Terminal it is not Characters Case Sensitive (example: get is equal GET)
Last, I Wish You A Fantastic Experince With My Terminal .

allCommands.command: emt get --page [page-name] (Without Square Brackets) [Pages Name: introduction, my-projects, about-me, my-skills, qualification, contact-me]
